meanings.definition: A rectangular groove cut into a board or plank.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully measured the dadoes for the bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The dadoes in the wooden panel added a decorative touch to the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide its toys in the dadoes of the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The dadoes in the wall held the memories of the old house like secret compartments.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast shadows into the dadoes, creating a pattern on the floor.

meanings.definition: The lower part of an interior wall when it is finished differently from the rest of the wall.
meanings.sent1: The painter chose a contrasting color for the dadoes to make the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: The dadoes were painted in a soft blue hue to match the curtains.
meanings.sent3: The children loved to play hide-and-seek behind the dadoes in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The dadoes in the hallway seemed to divide the space like a miniature fence.
meanings.sent5: The dadoes were adorned with intricate carvings, adding elegance to the room.
